```{r 'setup', include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  results='asis', 
  echo = FALSE
)

library(glue)
library(tidyverse)

# ======================================================================
# These variables determine how the the data is loaded and how the exports are
# done.

# Is data stored in google sheets? If no data will be gather from the csvs/
# folder in project
using_googlesheets <- TRUE

# Just the copied URL from the sheet
positions_sheet_loc <- "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fPY9wUeRcHWu5qijE4sZ8Xp6cGqasgdDNBJndmM3fBQ"

# Is this sheet available for anyone to read? If you're using a private sheet
# set this to false and go to gather_data.R and run the data loading manually
# once to cache authentication
sheet_is_publicly_readable <- TRUE

# Is the goal of this knit to build a document that is exported to PDF? If so
# set this to true to have links turned into footnotes at the end of the
# document
PDF_EXPORT <- FALSE


CV_PDF_LOC <- "http://lcolladotor.github.io/cv/en_CV_lcollado.pdf"
CV_HTML_LOC <- "http://lcolladotor.github.io/cv"


# A global (gasp) variable that holds all the links that were inserted for
# placement at the end
links <- c()

# ======================================================================
# Now we source two external scripts. One contains functions for building the
# text output and the other loads up our data from either googlesheets or csvs

# Functions for building sections from CSV data
source('nstrayer_cv/parsing_functions.R') 

# Load data for CV/Resume
source('nstrayer_cv/gather_data.R')
```

```{r 'getDownloads_fun', echo = FALSE}
getDownloads <- function(pkg, type = "software") {
    if(type == "experiment") {
        url <- paste0(
            'https://bioconductor.org/packages/stats/data-experiment/',
            pkg, '/', pkg, '_stats.tab'
        )
        
    } else if (type == "annotation") {
        url <- paste0(
            'https://bioconductor.org/packages/stats/data-annotation/',
            pkg, '/', pkg, '_stats.tab'
        )
        
    } else {
        url <- paste0(
            'https://bioconductor.org/packages/stats/bioc/',
            pkg, '/', pkg, '_stats.tab'
        )
        
    }
    info <- tryCatch(
        suppressWarnings(read.table(url, header = TRUE)),
        error = function(e) {
            return(data.frame(
                Nb_of_downloads = NA,
                'Month' = 'all'
            ))
        }
    )
    res <- sum(info$Nb_of_downloads[info$Month == 'all'])
    ## In case the download stats are currently unavailable
    if(is.na(res)) res <- paste0('(Not Available on ', Sys.Date(), ')')
    return(res)
}
```

### Bioconductor: author role

[recount3](http://bioconductor.org/packages/recount3): Explore and download data from the recount3 project -- `r getDownloads('recount3')` downloads. [biocthis](http://bioconductor.org/packages/biocthis): Automate package and project setup for Bioconductor packages -- `r getDownloads('biocthis')` downloads. [megadepth](http://bioconductor.org/packages/megadepth): BigWig and BAM related utilities -- `r getDownloads('megadepth')` downloads. [spatialLIBD](http://bioconductor.org/packages/LIBD): LIBD Visium spatial transcriptomics human pilot data inspector -- `r getDownloads('spatialLIBD', type = "experiment")` downloads. [GenomicState](http://bioconductor.org/packages/GenomicState): data for derfinder analyses -- `r getDownloads('GenomicState', type = "annotation")` downloads. [recount](http://bioconductor.org/packages/recount): Explore and download data from the recount2 project -- `r getDownloads('recount')` downloads. [derfinder](http://bioconductor.org/packages/derfinder): Annotation-agnostic differential expression analysis of RNA-seq data at base-pair resolution via the DER Finder approach -- `r getDownloads('derfinder')` downloads. [derfinderPlot](http://bioconductor.org/packages/derfinderPlot): plotting functions for derfinder results -- `r getDownloads('derfinderPlot')` downloads. [regionReport](http://bioconductor.org/packages/regionReport): Generate HTML or PDF reports for a set of genomic regions or DESeq2/edgeR results -- `r getDownloads('regionReport')` downloads. [derfinderHelper](http://bioconductor.org/packages/derfinderHelper): helper functions for derfinder package -- `r getDownloads('derfinderHelper')` downloads. [derfinderData](http://bioconductor.org/packages/derfinderData): data for derfinder examples -- `r getDownloads('derfinderData', type = "experiment")` downloads.
